statements: SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage WHERE quantity_used > 100;
SELECT crop_name, pesticide_name, quantity_used FROM pesticide_usage WHERE impact_on_health = 'Low';
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM pesticide_usage;
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity_used DESC;
SELECT AVG(quantity_used) AS average_quantity FROM pesticide_usage WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT crop_name, SUM(quantity_used) AS total_quantity_used FROM pesticide_usage GROUP BY crop_name HAVING total_quantity_used > 500
SELECT DISTINCT pesticide_name FROM pesticide_usage WHERE impact_on_health = 'High' ORDER BY pesticide_name ASC
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage WHERE quantity_used BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY quantity_used DESC
SELECT crop_name, AVG(quantity_used) AS average_quantity_used FROM pesticide_usage GROUP BY crop_name ORDER BY average_quantity_used
SELECT * FROM pesticides WHERE toxicity_level = 'low';
SELECT name, type FROM pesticides WHERE type = 'insecticide';
SELECT * FROM crop_health WHERE impact_on_health = 'positive' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT crop_id, application_amount FROM crop_health WHERE pesticide_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM pesticides WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY type ASC;
SELECT name, type, toxicity_level FROM pesticides WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM crop_health WHERE impact_on_health LIKE '%severe%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM pesticides GROUP BY type HAVING total_count > 5;
SELECT crop_id, SUM(application_amount) AS total_amount FROM crop_health GROUP BY crop_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM pesticides WHERE toxicity_level IN ('Low', 'Moderate', 'High') AND type = 'Insecticide';
SELECT * FROM PesticideUsage
SELECT pesticide_name, quantity_used FROM PesticideUsage WHERE usage_date = '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM Crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name DESC
SELECT id, crop_id, monitoring_date FROM MonitoringData WHERE health_status = 'Good' AND pesticide_residuals < 0.05
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops
SELECT * FROM PesticideUsage WHERE quantity_used > 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, crop_health FROM Crops WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT m.id, m.monitoring_date, m.pesticide_residuals, c.crop_name FROM MonitoringData m JOIN Crops c ON m.crop_id = c.id WHERE m.health_status = 'Good';

SELECT p.id AS pesticide_id, p.pesticide_name, u.usage_date, u.quantity_used, c.crop_name FROM PesticideUsage u JOIN Crops c ON u.crop_id = c.id JOIN MonitoringData m ON m.crop_id = c.id WHERE u.quantity_used > 50 AND m.health_status = 'Poor';
SELECT AVG(pesticide_residuals) AS avg_residuals, health_status FROM MonitoringData GROUP BY health_status HAVING AVG(pesticide_residuals) > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, pesticide_name, application_date FROM pesticide_usage WHERE application_quantity > 5;
SELECT crop_name, plant_date, harvest_date FROM crop ORDER BY plant_date DESC;
SELECT id, health_status, observation_date FROM crop_health WHERE health_status = 'Good';
SELECT id, pesticide_name, manufacturer FROM pesticide WHERE toxicity_level = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM crop;
SELECT crop_name, plant_date, harvest_date FROM crop ORDER BY plant_date DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.pesticide_name, p.manufacturer, c.crop_name, c.plant_date, c.harvest_date FROM pesticide p JOIN pesticide_usage pu ON p.pesticide_name = pu.pesticide_name JOIN crop c ON pu.crop_id = c.id;
SELECT cu.id, cu.crop_id, cu.health_status, ch.observation_date FROM crop_health ch LEFT JOIN crop_usage cu ON ch.crop_id = cu.crop_id WHERE health_status = 'Healthy';
SELECT AVG(application_quantity) AS avg_quantity, MIN(application_quantity) AS min_quantity, MAX(application_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM pesticide_usage;
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage;
SELECT crop_id, pesticide_name, usage_date FROM pesticide_usage WHERE quantity_used > 100;
SELECT crop_id, pesticide_name, quantity_used FROM pesticide_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM farm WHERE farm_size > 50;
SELECT farmer_name, location, contact_number FROM farmer ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage WHERE quantity_used > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crop WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND harvest_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, farmer_name, location FROM farmer WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY farmer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_health WHERE health_status = 'Good' AND observation_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01' ORDER BY observation_date ASC;

SELECT f.id AS farm_id, f.farm_name, COUNT(p.id) AS num_usage_records FROM farm AS f LEFT JOIN pesticide_usage AS p ON f.id = p.crop_id GROUP BY farm_id HAVING num_usage_records > 5 ORDER BY num_usage_records DESC;
